meanings.sent1: The broomballers skated swiftly on the ice.
meanings.sent2: We cheered for the broomballers during the match.
meanings.sent3: The broomballers slipped and slid comically on the icy rink.
meanings.sent4: The broomballers were like penguins gliding on the frozen pond.
meanings.sent5: I will always remember the broomballers' determination and teamwork.

meanings.definition: The group of individuals who participate in broomball games.
meanings.sent1: After the game, the broomballers celebrated their victory.
meanings.sent2: The broomballers practiced together to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The broomballers huddled together for warmth after the intense match.
meanings.sent4: The broomballers were a united force on the ice, moving as one.
meanings.sent5: The cheers of the broomballers echoed through the arena.
